scripts.test:unauth:firefox: cross-env BROWSER=firefox PW_PROJECT=unauthenticated npx playwright test --project=unauthenticated --reporter=line,allure-playwright
scripts.test:unauth:chrome: cross-env BROWSER=chromium PW_PROJECT=unauthenticated npx playwright test --project=unauthenticated --reporter=html
scripts.test:auth:chrome: cross-env BROWSER=chromium PW_PROJECT=authenticated npx playwright test --project=authenticated --reporter=html
scripts.test:auth:firefox: cross-env BROWSER=firefox PW_PROJECT=authenticated npx playwright test --project=authenticated --reporter=line,allure-playwright
scripts.test:both:chrome: npm run test:unauth:chrome && npm run test:auth:chrome
scripts.test:both:firefox: npm run test:unauth:firefox && npm run test:auth:firefox --reporter=html,line,allure-playwright
